name: Gunnership!!
description:
For this final, I decided to make changes to the preexisting level 2 as well as create an entire new level (level 3). The first of the three changes I made was that each enemy improves as you advance in the levels. For the gunner ships, I changed them from 1 to 2 guns in levels 2 and 3. I also increased the speed of the chaser enemies from 2 to 5, and then finally to 7.5 in level 3. The second change I made was to increase the size of the map. In the first one, everything is in view of the large camera, and it will only take like 5 seconds to complete. In the second one, the difficulty is increased and the map is a little larger, so it takes closer to 10–15 seconds. The final level 3 is a massive map that can take up to 30–60 seconds to complete. The final change I made was that I added asteroids to the map, which not only made the levels increasingly difficult but also more fun to play. I did this by adding additional rows of asteroids that make the game more like a maze with enemy ships hidden in or behind individual rocks, so it's more challenging. These changes culminate in a gaming experience that becomes increasingly difficult while still being extremely manageable and enjoyable.

Credited 

Mitchel Brown
